import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";// Material Kit 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";const{dark}=colors;const{size,fontWeightBold}=typography;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{display:"block",minHeight:pxToRem(24),marginBottom:pxToRem(2)},label:{display:"inline-block",fontSize:size.sm,fontWeight:fontWeightBold,color:dark.main,lineHeight:1,transform:"translateY(".concat(pxToRem(1),")"),marginLeft:pxToRem(4),"&.Mui-disabled":{color:dark.main}}}};
